sales_cue_question: What matters most to you in your next vehicle—presence, premium feel, or having the top trim?
What would make this feel easiest day-to-day—simplicity, flexibility, or more control?
When you say “smart choice,” what matters most—ownership costs, resale value, or long-term reliability?
What helps you feel most confident on the road—safety tech, predictable handling, or peace of mind?
What would make driving feel like you’ve earned it—comfort, performance, or a more enjoyable daily experience?
Who rides with you most, and what would make it better for everyone—space, comfort, or convenience?
